entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening and 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this evening and overnight. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023
